Reviews.Title: Ordered "WHITE" lens and Recieved a Soild BLACK lens...
Reviews.Author: Steven Cronin
Reviews.Content: I ordered the "Pentax SMC Pentax-DA L 18-55mm F3.5-5.6 AL (White) For Digital Slr Cameras (New in White Box)" and it was BLACK NOT WHITE. This has made me very unhappy because now I have a camera body with no lens as I wait to return this and purchase another one. LAME come on people

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Mitchell 100%
Reviews.Content: It's really loud zooming and autofocus. its a good beginner lens (I bought it because my kit lens was dropped and had a crack). The fstop doesn't always want to open up all the way and it sucks in low light. Good for a starter camera.

Reviews.Title: Fotoshopaholic says: "40 bucks + s&h; - are you serious?"
Reviews.Author: GERALD WOERGOETTER
Reviews.Content: and in brand new condition - can't beat it for the money.  The mount is plastic of course and everything in the tests is just about "normal", but it is useful nonetheless and I make my fashion statement matching the camera (haha).  It would have been about double the price if I'd have bought it right away with the body (so I saved some pocket money).  But, since I had already too many lenses I only got the body first.  There was another reason for me to complement it with this this std lens and it is not just fashion....it is simply practicality.  The best standard lens is of course is the 2.8/40, as an amateur I am a bit spoiled wanting the zoom range. Excused?

Small Compact Lens For digital Slr Pentax cameras
designed and made for K-r Kr K-x Kx K5 K-5 K-30
